DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the feasibility and efficacy of two interventions of lifestyle ( intensive and less intensive) to prevent diabetes in patients from Ethiopian origin, aged 25 to 55 years old with prediabetes living in Israel and insured by Clalit Health Services in the Central district, using resources existing in this Health Care system (HMO).
DOC.criteria: prediabetes age 2555 ethiopian origin diabetes age under 25 or above 55 non ethiopian origin
